MystifyAs.Title: Mystify {name}
MystifyAs.DropZone: Drag & Drop an Item here to set it as new look for {name}

allowNestedItems.Name: Allow tiering (nesting)
allowNestedItems.Hint: Check this option to be able to Mystify a Mystified Item, allowing for nested/tiered items that can be identified one at a time.

defaultIcons.name: Default Icons
defaultIcons.hint: Select which icons should be used as defaults for specific Item types.
defaultIcons.label: Open Icon Manager

itemProperties.name: Persisting Properties
itemProperties.hint: Select which Item properties should be by default carried over to mystified item.
itemProperties.label: Open Property Manager

keepOldIcon.name: Keep original Icon
keepOldIcon.hint: Check this setting to keep original item icon when mystifying. Advanced Mystify still allows manually selecting original vs default icons.

Notifications.defaultIconsInitialized: Forien's Unidentified Items | Default Item Type Icons has been randomly assigned. Please visit Module Settings for more information.
Notifications.defaultPropertiesInitialized: Forien's Unidentified Items | Default Persisting Item Properties have been generated. Please visit Module Settings for more information.
